metadata.title: CVE-2016-10228 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: The iconv program in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) 2.31 and earlier, when invoked with multiple suffixes in the destination encoding (TRANSLATE or IGNORE) along with the -c option, enters an infinite loop when processing invalid multi-byte input sequences, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
